Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND SUBSTANCE ABUSE

Title: Requires schools to include instruction on the prevention of co-occurring disorders as an integral part of their health education programs
Summary: Requires schools to include instruction on the prevention of co-occurring disorders as an integral part of their health education programs.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring schools to include instruction on the prevention of co-occurring disorders as an integral part of their health education programs
